DepositNative(address,uint256,uint256).details: emitted when native tokens are deposited to the SmartLoan

params.user: the address initiating deposit of native token

UnwrapAndWithdraw(address,uint256,uint25.details: emitted when native tokens are unwrapped and withdrawn from the SmartLoan

params.user: the address initiating unwrap and withdraw of native token

WrapNative(address,uint256,uint256).details: emitted when native tokens are wrapped in the SmartLoan
